WorkItem.Summary: Issue with relative move in a multisegment path

Comments.Message:
I ran into this issue today too.   Your fix will work most of the time, but it really needs to return to the initial point of the subpath (which may not be the same as the end point of the command prior to closepath) See the info here for "closepath"

http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/paths.html#PathDataClosePathCommand
